section.title: Why mybatis-spring - Motivation
section.para: In our daily work we've been strongly using both MyBatis Sql Mapper and Google Guice frameworks and once noticed we'd been continuosly repeating the same code snippets in different projects, according to the DRY don't repeat yourself principle, we started realizing something that alleviate us the task to create our stuff.

Indeed, this small library intends to create the missing perfect glue between the two popular frameworks, reducing the boilerplate and redundant code that users have to write to configure and use MyBatis into a Spring 3.X context.

section.title: Requirements
section.para: Before starting reading the manual, it is very important you're familiar with both MyBatis and Spring framework and therminology, otherwise it would be very difficult to understand the described context.
Like MyBatis, mybatis-spring requires Java 5 or higher.
